title: LF Team to Coach

embed.description: Bardarella / Diamond 4 14LP / 164W 148L Win Ratio 53% / Orianna - 55W 50L Win Ratio 52%, Twisted Fate - 10W 12L Win Ratio 45%, Corki - 11W 9L Win Ratio 55%, Sylas - 11W 9L Win Ratio 55%, Zoe - 11W 6L Win Ratio 65%

body:
Hi All,

Looking for a diamond or below team to coach.

Have experience coaching a number of different team and can assist with you communication, marco and decision making.

Looking to keep gaining experience as a coach and to build out my resume of helping players succeed.

D4 Account on NA but have just moved back to OCE, contact me here, in game (IGN: CoachBard) or by email bardarellagg@gmail.com)

Thanks,

Sam
